description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Entrances/Exits Arrangements in Exhibition Centre Station

2025-06-26T09:43:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that because of road closures near the station, Entrance/Exit B1 in Exhibition Centre is temporarily closed. Please use other Entrances/Exits.
2025-06-26T09:43:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於站外有封路措施，會展站B1出入口暫時關閉，請使用其他出入口。

2025-06-26T10:59:00.CONTENT_EN: Because of road closures near the station, Entrance/Exit B1 in Exhibition Centre is temporarily closed. Please use other Entrances/Exits.   At the same time, affected bus routes gradually resume to their original routeings.
2025-06-26T10:59:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於站外有封路措施，會展站B1出入口暫時關閉，請使用其他出入口。  同時，受影響巴士路線陸續恢復原有路線行駛。
